summary: Adds a bunch of new wacky races to the game to make it more interesting!
descriptionHtml:
Suggestions are welcome! 
This is just fun mod to change Skyrim up a bit! 
Current Races: 
Child(doesn\'t let you see your armor but you\'re still wearing it) 
Elds(Perfectly normal) 
Dremora(Perfect) 
Giants(Good until you draw you weapon and can\'t do anything, also the third person looks from under the floor) 
I can\'t remember to others but have fun! 

The races where it says no class description are the races that do not work but are fun! 

Man Bear pig was hard cuz i had to add in new textures...

I will try to change these and please subscribe! 
Also this is my first mod so dont troll... 

INSTALLATION:
DRAG AND DROP THE .ESP FILES INTO YOU DATA FOLDER IN THE SKYRIM DIRECTORY!
CONTACT ME IF THERE ARE BUGS!

See the original file on Steam! http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=121272716
author: jwdickey34
